e23-CO2060-Smart_Travel_Companion.title: Smart_Travel_Companion
e23-CO2060-Smart_Travel_Companion.description: A mobile app that helps tourists plan trips in Sri Lanka with itineraries, attractions, transport, and accommodation guidance.

e23-co2060-2YP-SkillShare.title: 2YP SkillShare
e23-co2060-2YP-SkillShare.description: Skill-Share is a platform where the university students can share not only their academic knowledge but maily also their soft skills with their collegues for another skill which they interested in learning in return. This platform match the user interested skills with others' interests and find a common free slot for the meetup.

e23-co2060-Alumnet.title: Alumnet
e23-co2060-Alumnet.description: A scalable, role-based platform for streamlining alumni-student mentorship and university event management. Built with React, Node.js and PostgreSQL for the CO2060 Software System Design Project.

e23-co2060-ChronoCampus.title: ChronoCampus
e23-co2060-ChronoCampus.description: ChronoCampus is a web-based system for managing academic schedules and campus facilities at universities. It provides real-time lecture, lab, tutorial, and exam timetables, notifications for changes, room and lab availability, and staff location tracking, supporting efficient coordination for students and faculty.

e23-co2060-Computer-vision-and-AI-lab-sy.title: Computer vision and AI lab system
e23-co2060-Computer-vision-and-AI-lab-sy.description: A unified web platform designed for the Computer Vision & AI Lab, integrating a public research portfolio with a robust internal management system for streamlining equipment bookings and GPU resource scheduling.

e23-co2060-FindIT.title: FindIT
e23-co2060-FindIT.description: Losing valuables like keys, wallets, or laptops is stressful on a busy campus. The Lost and Found Information System is a smart, privacy-first platform that connects people who’ve lost items with those who’ve found them using structured reports, intelligent matching, and secure gradual disclosure to prevent fraud and protect privacy.

e23-co2060-GiftBox-Customization-Marketp.title: GiftBox Customization Marketplace
e23-co2060-GiftBox-Customization-Marketp.description: A scalable multi-vendor marketplace where users mix products from different sellers to create custom gift boxes. Includes personalization, vendor management, and seamless ordering for a flexible gifting experience.

e23-co2060-GoTravel.title: GoTravel
e23-co2060-GoTravel.description: GoTravel is a web platform to explore destinations, learn history, and book buses, trains, and hotels in one place.

e23-co2060-Health-Management-System.title: Health Management System
e23-co2060-Health-Management-System.description: A MERN-based Health Management System for managing patients, doctors, labs, and admins. It supports appointments, medical records, and lab results with role-based access control. An AI support feature assists doctors with suggestions while final decisions remain human-made.

e23-co2060-Hotel-Management-System.title: Hotel Management System
e23-co2060-Hotel-Management-System.description: A web-based platform designed to help tourists in Sri Lanka manage their stays efficiently. Built with React, Node.js, and MySQL, the system centralizes room and meal bookings, local event discovery, and transport services. It aims to save time for travelers while supporting local businesses and enhancing the tourism ecosystem.

e23-co2060-Kitchen-Foods-Platform.title: Kitchen Foods Platform
e23-co2060-Kitchen-Foods-Platform.description: Kitchen Foods is a hyper-local digital food platform designed to connect verified home chefs with customers such as tourists, office workers, and nearby residents. The system aims to provide access to healthy, affordable, and authentic homemade meals while empowering skilled women by creating income-generating opportunities from their homes.

e23-co2060-MPhil-PhD-Lifecycle-Managemen.title: MPhil PhD Lifecycle Management System
e23-co2060-MPhil-PhD-Lifecycle-Managemen.description: The MPhil & PhD Lifecycle Management System is a centralized web platform to track postgraduate students from registration to thesis submission. It supports supervision, progress reviews, ethics approvals, document management, dashboards, and automated reminders, improving transparency, compliance, and administrative efficiency at faculty level.

e23-co2060-Maathacare.title: Maathacare
e23-co2060-Maathacare.description: MaathaCare is a smart digital pregnancy support system designed to enhance Sri Lanka’s public maternal healthcare services through technology. While the existing healthcare framework is strong, many processes remain manual and paper-based. This often results in missed clinic visits, irregular use of supplements and tracking high risk pregnancies.

e23-co2060-NexClinic.title: NexClinic
e23-co2060-NexClinic.description: An AI based healthcare application that connects patients and doctors allowing secure login appointment management medical reminders and future AI assisted health support

e23-co2060-OrthoFlow.title: OrthoFlow
e23-co2060-OrthoFlow.description: Web-based system for digitising orthodontic case records. Supports structured clinical data, media management, timeline-based treatment tracking, and role-based access. Improves diagnostic consistency, reduces errors, and enables longitudinal patient follow-up.

e23-co2060-Orthodontics-Workflow-Automat.title: Orthodontics Workflow Automation System
e23-co2060-Orthodontics-Workflow-Automat.description: The Orthodontics Workflow Automation System (OWAS) is a web-based platform that replaces manual dental records with a secure digital hub. By centralizing patient history and images, it enables instant data retrieval and faster care. Its modular, scalable architecture ensures future-readiness for integration across the entire Dental Hospital.

e23-co2060-PeraWave.title: PeraWave
e23-co2060-PeraWave.description: PeraWave is a centralized web application for university students to connect, discuss openly or anonymously, explore campus history and stay updated on events.

e23-co2060-RoadAid.title: RoadAid
e23-co2060-RoadAid.description: RoadAid is a smart roadside assistance platform designed to provide fast and reliable help during vehicle-related emergencies. RoadAid supports multiple types of roadside issues, including vehicle breakdowns, tire punchers and out of fuel situations, all through a single unified platform.

e23-co2060-Smart-Tourism.title: Smart Tourism
e23-co2060-Smart-Tourism.description: The Smart Tourism Management System reduces information fragmentation and trust issues in Sri Lanka’s tourism industry through a centralized, user-controlled platform. Using a Human-in-the-Loop design with itinerary planning, verified guides, and community reviews, it ensures reliable and transparent travel planning.

e23-co2060-TransitPro.title: TransitPro
e23-co2060-TransitPro.description: TransitPro is a web-based transport and rental vehicle management system that improves travel planning and booking convenience. Users can view daily schedules, check routes, and book or rent vehicles based on real-time availability, seating capacity, and comfort options. An admin panel manages vehicles, routes, schedules, and bookings efficiently.

e23-co2060-antigravity.title: antigravity
e23-co2060-antigravity.description: This project develops a scalable and secure e-commerce web application featuring product browsing, cart management, secure payments, and an admin dashboard. It focuses on performance, usability, and reliability using modern software design principles.

e23-co2060-stress-detection-and-analyzin.title: stress detection and analyzing system
e23-co2060-stress-detection-and-analyzin.description: Our app detects and categorizes stress for undergraduates and early workers using the DASS questionnaire. Users are classified as mild, moderate, or severe. Mild users receive tools like music and journaling, while moderate and severe users are guided to professional mental health resources.
